title: President Donald J. Trump’s Commitment to Workforce Development Generates Training Opportunities for Millions of Americans – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
October 31, 2018
We’re asking businesses and organizations across the country to sign our new pledge to America’s workers.
						President Donald J. Trump					ANSWERING THE PLEDGE: Companies and associations are responding to President Donald J. Trump’s call and pledging to educate and train more than 6 million workers.  DEVELOPING OUR WORKFORCE: President Trump has prioritized workforce development to better train and equip American workers.MEETING JOB MARKET DEMANDS: The American economy is roaring back to life and offering workers more and more opportunities that require new skills and training.
